original_title: Evanescence - A Live Session From Rock Falcon Studio
overview: "They will be ""performing both new and sold songs"" during the event – which is dubbed Evanescence: A Live Session From Rock Falcon Studio – with the group having gotten together remotely from Nashville, Sacramento and Germany in order to film it.  A press release states that Evanescence will play ""live renditions of songs from their upcoming album The Bitter Truth for the first time, as well as some fan favourites and a few can’t-miss surprises""."
title: Evanescence - A Live Session From Rock Falcon Studio
